name: Marimo's Journey
description:
Join Marimo, a sentient ball of moss and aspiring trapeze artist.

Guide Marimo as they roll, swing, fly, and fall through three levels.

Controls: Mouse and WASD / Arrow Keys

Created with Godot 3.1 for the 2021 Great Spring Game Jame

Game design and programming by Jayne the Human

Music, sound design, art, and project management by Kodaly

Uses OpenDyslexic Font by Abbie Gonzalez
